name: Fork JuiceBox to BSC and other chains
description:
We decided to build a New Donation Platform, for the reason that the team of JB vetoed the bill to set an upper limit to JuiceBoxDao, so it seriously harms the benefit of our donators.
Most of the community members voted yes while the team members voted no using the free tokens reserved when we donate.
We have more than 1 million JBX and we're totally disappointed.
The new donation platform will fork the JB code and run on chains like bsc, solana, etc...
And a donation target will be set to make it possible for the donators to make money.
The team of the new platform will never veto the bill of community, it's a promise.
Please give us your email address when you donate, we will build an email group.
